page.title: 12Recreation (1) in Mousehole
page.content: {Mousehole}has a number of clubs which serve some of the community's recreational needs. There are the {Girl's Life Brigade}and the{Boy's {Brigade}which are both affiliated to {St. Clements Methodist Chapel}to cater for the younger age groups. For the older age group there is a {British Legion Club}which provides for games such as billiards, snooker, darts and cards to be played. The British Legion Hall was built in 1929 after the foundations had been dug out by the local men and women, with the actual money for the building coming from ex-servicemen. There has always been a very active women's section which was formed to raise money for{Legion { Charities}such as Rest Homes, Widows and Orphans and Rehabilitation Centres.
